250 Health

item1.name: Shurelya's Battlesong
item1.description:
40 Ability Power
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen

Active - Inspire: Grants you and nearby allies 60% decaying Move Speed for 4 seconds. Champions gain an additional 35 - 55 (based on ally level) magic damage on the next 3 Attacks or Ability hits against champions (75s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 2.5% Move Speed.

Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item2.name: Glacial Buckler
item2.description:
20 Armor
250 Mana
10 Ability Haste

item3.name: Control Ward
item3.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item5.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item5.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Guardian
perk0.shortDesc: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage based on level, you're both granted a shield.
perk0.longDesc:
Guard allies within 350 units of you, and allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While Guarding, if you or the ally take more than a small amount of damage over the duration of the Guard, both of you gain a shield for 1.5s.

Cooldown: 70 - 40 seconds
Shield: 70 - 150 + 15% of your ability power + 9% of your bonus health
Proc Threshold: 90 - 250 postmitigation damage

item4.description:
250 Health
25 Armor
250 Mana
20 Ability Haste

Active - Conduit: Designate an Accomplice (60s cooldown).
  • Convergence: For 8 seconds after you Immobilize an enemy, your Accomplice's Attacks ( On-Hit) and Ability hits apply an additional (30 - 70 (based on level) + 1.5% Health + 7.5% Ability Power) magic damage to that enemy.

    Champions can only be linked by one Zeke's Convergence at a time.

Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

perk0.name: Guardian
perk0.shortDesc: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage based on level, you're both granted a shield.
perk0.longDesc:
Guard allies within 350 units of you, and allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While Guarding, if you or the ally take more than a small amount of damage over the duration of the Guard, both of you gain a shield for 1.5s.

Cooldown: 70 - 40 seconds
Shield: 70 - 150 + 15% of your ability power + 9% of your bonus health
Proc Threshold: 90 - 250 postmitigation damage

Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item2.name: Pauldrons of Whiterock
item2.description:
15 Attack Damage
250 Health
100% Base Health Regen
3 Gold Per 10 Seconds

Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.

This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

item3.name: Mobility Boots
item3.description:
25 Move Speed
  • When out of combat for at least 5 seconds, increase this item's effect to 115.

item4.name: Knight's Vow
item4.description:
400 Health
10 Ability Haste
300% Base Health Regen

Active - Pledge: Designate an ally who is Worthy (60s cooldown).
  • Sacrifice: While your Worthy ally is nearby, redirect 15% of damage they take to you and if they have less than 50% Health gain 35% Move Speed when running towards them.

    Champions can only be linked by one Knight's Vow at a time. Damage redirection stops if you have less than 30% Health

item5.name: Kindlegem
item5.description:
200 Health
10 Ability Haste

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Guardian
perk0.shortDesc: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage based on level, you're both granted a shield.
perk0.longDesc:
Guard allies within 350 units of you, and allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While Guarding, if you or the ally take more than a small amount of damage over the duration of the Guard, both of you gain a shield for 1.5s.

Cooldown: 70 - 40 seconds
Shield: 70 - 150 + 15% of your ability power + 9% of your bonus health
Proc Threshold: 90 - 250 postmitigation damage

item0.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
item0.description:
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
30 Armor
30 Magic Resist

Active - Devotion: Grant nearby allies a 230 - 385 (based on ally level) Shield, decaying over 2.5 seconds (90s cooldown).
  • Consecrate: Grant nearby allied champions 5 Armor and Magic Resist.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 2 Armor/ Magic Resist increase to Consecrate.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item1.name: Mikael's Blessing
item1.description:
20% Heal and Shield Power
50 Magic Resist
15 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen

Active - Purify: Remove all crowd control debuffs (except Knockups and Suppression) from an ally champion and restore 100 - 200 (based on ally level) Health (120s cooldown).

item1.description:
20% Heal and Shield Power
200 Health
15 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen

Active - Intervention: Target an area within 5500 range. After 2.5 seconds, call down a beam of light to Restore 180 - 360 (scales with ally level) Health to allies and burn enemy champions for 10% max Health true damage (120s cooldown).

perk0.longDesc:
Guard allies within 350 units of you, and allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While Guarding, if you or the ally take more than a small amount of damage over the duration of the Guard, both of you gain a shield for 1.5s.

Cooldown: 70 - 40 seconds
Shield: 70 - 150 + 15% of your ability power + 9% of your bonus health
Proc Threshold: 90 - 250 postmitigation damage

item0.name: Pauldrons of Whiterock
item0.description:
15 Attack Damage
250 Health
100% Base Health Regen
3 Gold Per 10 Seconds

Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.

This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

item1.name: Control Ward
item1.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item2.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
item2.description:
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
30 Armor
30 Magic Resist

Active - Devotion: Grant nearby allies a 230 - 385 (based on ally level) Shield, decaying over 2.5 seconds (90s cooldown).
  • Consecrate: Grant nearby allied champions 5 Armor and Magic Resist.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 2 Armor/ Magic Resist increase to Consecrate.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item3.name: Redemption
item3.description:
20% Heal and Shield Power
200 Health
15 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen

Active - Intervention: Target an area within 5500 range. After 2.5 seconds, call down a beam of light to Restore 180 - 360 (scales with ally level) Health to allies and burn enemy champions for 10% max Health true damage (120s cooldown).

Item can be activated whilst dead. Damage and healing reduced by 50% if the target has recently been affected by another Intervention. Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item4.name: Mobility Boots
item4.description:
25 Move Speed
  • When out of combat for at least 5 seconds, increase this item's effect to 115.

item5.name: Glacial Buckler
item5.description:
20 Armor
250 Mana
10 Ability Haste

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Aftershock
perk0.shortDesc: After <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Immobilize'>immobilizing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> an enemy champion gain defenses and later deal a burst of magic damage around you.
perk0.longDesc:
After immobilizing an enemy champion, increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 35 + 80% of your Bonus Resists for 2.5s. Then explode, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

Damage: 25 - 120 (+8% of your bonus health)
Cooldown: 20s

Resistance bonus from Aftershock capped at: 80-150 (based on level)
